placeholderImages.description: Gentle ocean waves on a serene beach at dusk.
A monarch butterfly on a white flower, symbolizing transformation.

Listen!

In a basket of fruits, there are both fresh and rotten ones.

People always choose fresh fruits.
 
But God? 

He chooses the rotten one.
 
That rejected, spoiled, unwanted fruit, thrown-away fruit, "Do you know who that fruit is?

That is you. That is me.
 
Yes, He restores what the world calls wasted

and turns our rotten lives into something sweet and new.
 
That’s God.❤️🍎✨

Our Father 𝐉𝐄𝐒𝐔𝐒 lovingly prepares valuable gifts for us throughout our lives 💎❤️💍
 
But what do we often do? 🤷🏻‍♀️
 
We focus so much 🔎 on the gifts 🎁 we've received, that we forget something vital: the Giver is far more valuable than the gifts. 😌
 
Please, don't let that be your story 👈🏻
 
You might wonder, Why does 𝐆𝐎𝐃 give us gifts that reflect such great worth? 👑
 
Because 𝐇𝐞 𝐇𝐢𝐦𝐬𝐞𝐥𝐟 is worth far more 💎✨ than anyone or anything He places in our lives.
 
I pray this encourages your heart today.
Portrait of a man in a suit.
Portrait of a woman looking hopeful.
Portrait of a man looking up.
Portrait of a woman with glasses.
Portrait of a man reading a bible.
An open book with a heart-shaped shadow.
A person standing on a mountain looking at the sunset.
Two hands reaching for each other.
